item.title: Missionary Work Is the Lifeblood of the Church
item.description:
Missionary Work Is the Lifeblood of the Church by Elder H. Verlan Andersen, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 156th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 1986
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder H. Verlan Andersen, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: “Bring Up Your Children in Light and Truth”
item.description:
“Bring Up Your Children in Light and Truth” by Elder H. Verlan Andersen, Released Member of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 161st Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 1991
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
